snp3.6:4.1: pakudho → pakuddho (sya-all, km), sañcayo → sañjayo (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed), belaṭṭhaputto → bellaṭṭhiputto (bj) | veḷaṭṭhaputto (sya-all) | belaṭṭhiputto (pts-vp-pli1ed), nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto → nigaṇṭho nātaputto (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
snp3.6:7.2: yepi kho te → ye kho te (sya-all) | yaṃ kho te (mr)
snp3.6:8.2: samaṇo kho → samaṇo kho gotamo (sya-all, mr)
snp3.6:53.2: na upalimpati → toye na upalippati (bj) | toye na upalippati (pts-vp-pli1ed) | toyena na upalimpati (mr)
